wikipedia_page.main: George Patrick McGuigan (born 30 March 1993) is an English rugby union player who plays for Newcastle Falcons in Premiership Rugby. His position is Hooker and has represented England Saxons as well as Ireland U18s, U20s on several occasions.  Between 2016–2018 he played 35 times for Leicester Tigers.

response: Newcastle keen to follow on from the success of last season expanded their squad with key players such as Logovi'i Mulipola, John Hardie, Nemani Nagusa and George McGuigan.
